parameters.name: DatabaseAccountName
parameters.description: The name of the database account to query. The name can be up to 128 characters in length. Only exact match is supported.

parameters.name: DatabaseId
parameters.description:
The ID of the database whose database accounts you want to query.

>  You can call the [ListDatabases](~~2758822~~) operation to query the database ID.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The bastion host ID.

> You can call the DescribeInstances operation to query the bastion host ID.[](~~153281~~)

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.\
Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 20. If you leave this parameter empty, 20 entries are returned on each page.

> We recommend that you do not leave this parameter empty.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host.

> For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).
